name: unnaturally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not natural: Her skin looked unnaturally yellow. Not unnaturally (= naturally) people were offended. See
unnatural
More examplesFewer examples The desire to be unnaturally thin creates a dangerous cycle of abuse. He was well-behaved and unnaturally quiet for a young boy.Years of heavy rain kept the lake unnaturally high.
